versos: (pleaseth) Psalm 149:4 - "For the Lord taketh pleasure in his people: he will beautify the meek with salvation.";;;
(dealt) Psalm 119:3 - They do nothing wrong; they walk in his ways.;;
(angel) Hebrews 1:14 - "Are not all angels ministering spirits sent to serve those who will inherit salvation";;;
(speaketh) "If any man speak in an unknown tongue, let it be by two, or at the most by three, and that by course; and let one interpret." - 1 Corinthians 14:27;;;
(camest) "Thou camest down also upon Mount Sinai, and spakest with them from heaven, and gavest them right judgments, and true laws, good statutes and commandments" - Nehemiah 9:13 KJV;;;
(whither) Matthew 8:19 - "And a certain scribe came, and said unto him, Master, I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest.";;;
(flee) 1 Corinthians 6:18 flee from sexual immorality. All other sins a person commits are outside the body
(submit) Ephesians 5:22 - "Wives, submit yourselves to your own husbands as you do to the Lord.";;;
(ishmael) Genesis 16:11 - The angel of the Lord also said to her: "You are now pregnant and you will give birth to a son. You shall name him ishmael, for the Lord has heard of your misery.";;;
(wild) "They live on the mountain cliffs and have their homes in the rocks, they are wild animals." - Job 39:28 NIV;;;
(beer) Proverbs 20:1 - "Wine is a mocker, strong drink is raging: and whosoever is deceived thereby is not wise.";;;
(almighty) "I am the Alpha and the Omega," says the Lord God, "who is, and who was, and who is to come, the almighty." - Revelation 1:8;;;
(abraham) Genesis 22:18 - "and through your offspring all nations on earth will be blessed, because you have obeyed me.";;;

(foreskin) "Behold, I will cause those of the synagogue of Satan, who say that they are Jews and are not, but lie--I will make them come and bow down at your feet, and make them know that I have loved you." - Revelation 3:9;;;
(betwixt) Ezekiel 22:30 - "And I sought for a man among them, that should make up the hedge, and stand in the gap before me for the land, that I should not destroy it: but I found none.";;;
